attributes.action: Help casualties of the Ukraine Crisis with funds from Russian sanctions.
attributes.additional_details: Its is the right thing to do, and may help to alleviate some of the suffering. It will hopefully show the people of Ukraine and Russia that we care about helping the people affected, and that, above all else we prioritise the de-escalation of the conflict.
attributes.background:
All of the proceeds from the seizure of Russian assets due to the Ukraine crisis should go to helping the casualties of the Ukraine conflict, irrespective of their nationality.

Pass a bill that shows that this is how all funds will be used, with no exceptions.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/610119

Current sanctions only freeze assets of sanctioned individuals, so the UK Government is not gaining any funds from these sanctions.

You can find details of the UK’s sanctions regime relating to Russia here: https://www.gov.uk/government/collections/uk-sanctions-on-russia
